quote: The other dark places,' Evan whispered. Visions of tunnels of earth and stone, caves and streams entered his head. It was far beneath them. He knew it was real and it was down there, waiting.
quote_letters: THE OTHER DARK PLACES EVAN WHISPERED VISIONS OF TUNNELS OF EARTH AND STONE CAVES AND STREAMS ENTERED HIS HEAD IT WAS FAR BENEATH THEM HE KNEW IT WAS REAL AND IT WAS DOWN THERE WAITING
